title: C Is for Canada
description: C Is for Canada is a book written in the form of emails between two pen pals: Stephanie from the United States and Jacqueline from Canada. Stephanie's school assignment is to write a report about Canada, so Jacqueline writes about the details of her country. Photographs support the text.
meta: ancestors, caribou, constitution, constitutional monarchy, democracy, heritage, Inuit, Parliament, provinces, republic, territories
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand the text
Compound Sentences : Identify compound sentences used in the text
Compound Words : Identify and create compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
